column1: #Text=Gun says : " Avatar Korra , Master Tenzin , it is a pleasure to welcome you and your party to the Upper Ring of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Aah , it 's got that Upper Ring smell .
#Text=" Gun says : " Oh no , the queen hates animals .
#Text=You 'll have to get them out of sight .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , I can just stash Pabu in my shirt , these two are going to be a little tougher .
#Text=" Gun says : " Come with me , hurry , I 'll take you to your quarters .
